item.title: 贸易战困境推动黄金屡创新高
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税计划会引发全球贸易战和经济后果，投资者纷纷转向避险资产，黄金周一触及历史新高，突破了3,100美元的水平。【原文：Gold touched an all-time high on Monday, breaching the $3,100 level, as investors turned to the safe-haven asset amid concerns that U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff plans would stoke a global trade war and economic fallout.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣称将就外汇问题与美国密切沟通
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信周一表示，他将与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）就外汇问题进行密切沟通，并指出密切对话对市场稳定非常重要。【原文：Japan Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato said on Monday that he would communicate closely with U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on foreign exchange, pointing out that close dialogue is important for market stability.】

item.title: 美国关税和不确定性推动避险资金流入，黄金飙升突破 3100 美元
item.description: 周一，金价首次飙升至每盎司 3100 美元以上，原因是对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税和潜在经济影响的担忧，以及对地缘政治的担忧，推动了新一轮对避险资产的投资热潮。【原文：Gold prices on Monday soared above $3,100 per ounce for the first time as concerns around U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and the potential economic fallout, combined with geopolitical worries, drove a fresh wave of investments into the safe-haven asset.】

item.title: 台湾总统在美国可能征收关税前听取简报
item.description: 台湾总统赖清德办公室周一表示，赖清德总统周日晚会见了高级官员，讨论了美国关税可能带来的影响，并听取了应急计划的最新进展。【原文：Taiwan President Lai Ching-te met senior officials on Sunday night to discuss the possible impact of U.S. tariffs and receive an update on contingency plans, his office said on Monday.】

item.title: 订单强劲，中国制造业创 12 个月新高
item.description: 周一的一项工厂调查显示，中国制造业活动在 3 月份以一年来最快的速度扩张，新订单促进了生产，使这个世界第二大经济体在应对愈演愈烈的美国贸易战时得到了一些缓解。【原文：China's manufacturing activity expanded at the fastest pace in a year in March, a factory survey showed on Monday, with new orders boosting production, giving the world's No.2 economy some reprieve as it deals with an intensifying U.S. trade war.】

item.title: 中国国有媒体批评港口交易，长江和记股价下跌 4.5%
item.description: 长江和记 0001.HK 股价周一最多下跌了 4.7%，此前中国国家媒体批评了这家香港企业集团的巴拿马港口交易，消息人士称，预计于 4 月 2 日签署的交易将被推迟。【原文：Shares of CK Hutchison 0001.HK fell as much as 4.7% on Monday after China state media criticised the Hong Kong conglomerate's Panama port deal and sources said the deal, which was expected to be signed on April 2, would be delayed.】

item.title: 日元上涨，黄金创历史新高，关税忧虑点燃避险需求
item.description: 由于交易商担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策将引发通货膨胀并抑制经济增长，避险货币日元周一上涨，而黄金则升至历史新高。【原文：The safe-haven Japanese yen rose on Monday while gold pushed to a fresh all-time peak as traders worried that U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs will ignite inflation and crimp economic growth.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普警告可能对俄罗斯买家征收关税，但油价仍有所松动
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普警告说，如果他认为莫斯科阻碍了他结束乌克兰战争的努力，他可能会对俄罗斯石油的买家征收二级关税，但周一油价仍有所回落，有望实现季度微跌。【原文：Oil prices eased on Monday, heading for a slight quarterly loss despite a warning by U.S. President Donald Trump that he may impose secondary tariffs on buyers of Russian oil if he feels Moscow is blocking his efforts to end the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 新华社：中国海洋石油总公司在南海发现亿吨级油田
item.description: 据新华社周一报道，中国海洋石油总公司（中海油）在南海发现了一个探明储量超过 1 亿吨的油田。【原文：The China National Offshore Oil Corporation (CNOOC) has discovered an oilfield in the South China Sea with proven reserves exceeding 100 million tonnes, Xinhua news agency reported on Monday.】

item.title: 香港长江和记表示尚未决定电信公司分拆事宜
item.description: 香港企业集团长江和记董事会周一表示，针对媒体有关其全球电信业务可能分拆上市的报道，该公司尚未作出任何决定。【原文：The board of Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison said on Monday it has not made any decision on its global telecommunications business, in response to media reports about a potential spin-off listing of the assets.】

item.title: 中银航空将购买 120 架波音和空客飞机
item.description: 总部位于新加坡的中银航空周一表示，已与波音公司达成协议，购买 50 架波音 737-8 飞机，具体价格未透露。【原文：Singapore-based BOC Aviation said on Monday it has entered into an agreement with Boeing to purchase 50 Boeing 737-8 aircraft for an undisclosed sum.】

item.title: 关税倒计时，股市下滑，债券反弹
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市跟随华尔街期货走低，因为投资者在对美国即将征收关税的形式和范围知之甚少的情况下，难以对即将到来的关税风险进行定价。【原文：Asia stocks followed Wall Street futures lower on Monday as investors struggled to price in the risk of imminent U.S. tariffs with so little still known about what form or scope the levies will take.】

item.title: 奥克兰机场在监察机构批评后削减旅客收费
item.description: 新西兰奥克兰国际机场周一表示，在该国竞争监督机构称机场运营商向航空公司和旅客多收费用后，该机场将削减航空公司的旅客收费。【原文：New Zealand's Auckland International Airport said on Monday it will cut airline passenger charges after the country's competition watchdog said the airport operator was overcharging airlines and travellers.】

item.title: 特朗普称对等关税将针对所有国家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周日表示，他将于本周宣布的互惠互利关税将包括所有国家，而不仅仅是由 10 到 15 个国家组成的小集团。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday reciprocal tariffs he is set to announce this week will include all nations, beyond just a smaller group of 10 to 15 countries.】

item.title: 特朗普称 TikTok 出售协议将在周六截止日期前达成
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，将在周六截止日期前与 TikTok 的中国母公司字节跳动达成协议，出售这款有 1.7 亿美国人使用的短视频应用。【原文：President Donald Trump said a deal with TikTok's Chinese parent ByteDance to sell the short video app used by 170 million Americans would be struck before a deadline on Saturday.】

item.title: WiseTech Global 任命 Chris Charlton 和 Andrew Harrison 为独立非执行董事
item.description: 慧科全球（WiseTech Global）周一表示，已任命克里斯-查尔顿（Chris Charlton）和安德鲁-哈里森（Andrew Harrison）为董事会独立非执行董事，此举旨在使其审计与风险委员会符合交易所规定。【原文：WiseTech Global said on Monday it has appointed Chris Charlton and Andrew Harrison as independent non-executive directors to its board, in a move to make its audit and risk committee compliant with exchange regulations.】

item.title: 据《澳大利亚金融时报》报道，维珍澳大利亚公司高管将与投资者会面，商讨在澳大利亚证券交易所重新上市事宜
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（AFR）周日晚间报道，贝恩资本控股的维珍澳大利亚公司将在 2020 年退市后重返澳大利亚证券交易所。【原文：Bain Capital-owned Virgin Australia is set to return to the Australian stock exchange after delisting in 2020, the Australian Financial Review (AFR) reported late on Sunday.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨表示欧盟已准备好在贸易关税问题上回应美国
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）周日表示，欧洲希望与美国合作，但如果华盛顿在别无选择的情况下对钢铁和铝征收关税，欧盟已做好统一应对的准备。【原文：Europe wants to cooperate with the United States but the EU is ready to respond as one if Washington leaves it no choice by imposing tariffs on steel and aluminium, German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said on Sunday.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司任命哈坎-塞缪尔森（Hakan Samuelsson）为新任首席执行官
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司周日表示，已任命哈坎-塞缪尔森（Hakan Samuelsson）为新任首席执行官，自 2025 年 4 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Volvo Cars has appointed Hakan Samuelsson as its new chief executive, effective April 1, 2025, it said on Sunday.】

item.title: 如果无法就乌克兰问题达成协议，特朗普威胁对俄罗斯石油征收二次关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，如果他认为莫斯科阻碍了他结束乌克兰战争的努力，他将对所有俄罗斯石油征收 25% 至 50% 的二级关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday he will impose secondary tariffs of 25% to 50% on all Russian oil if he feels Moscow is blocking his efforts to end the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 澳大利亚预测美元走低将打击资源和能源出口收益
item.description: 澳大利亚政府周一表示，随着关键的铁矿石运输价格下降，澳大利亚矿业和能源出口收入预计将在截至 6 月份的财政年度下降 6%。【原文：Australia's mining and energy export earnings are expected to fall 6% in the financial year through June, with prices of its key iron ore shipments declining, the government said on Monday.】

item.title: 为什么特朗普的汽车关税会伤害他的工人阶级支持者？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对进口汽车征收 25% 关税的政策对工薪阶层的汽车买家打击最大，因为几乎所有在美国销售的低成本新车都是在其他地方生产的。【原文：Working-class car buyers will be the hardest hit by U.S. President Donald Trump’s 25% tariff on imported vehicles because almost all low-cost new cars sold in the United States are built elsewhere.】

item.title: 第一季度的市场：一切都被 "特朗普化 "了！
item.description: 大多数投资者都知道，鉴于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重新掌权世界最大的经济体和金融市场，今年的形势可能会变得动荡不安，但很少有人预料到今年的形势会像迄今为止的这种 "圈地运动"。【原文：Most investors knew things could turn turbulent this year given U.S. President Donald Trump's return to power in the world's biggest economy and financial market, but few predicted the kind of a rodeo ride it has been so far.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称，日本将给予加密资产作为金融产品的合法地位
item.description: 日经商业日报》周日称，日本金融厅计划修订《金融商品交易法》，赋予加密资产作为金融产品的合法地位。【原文：Japan's Financial Services Agency plans to revise the Financial Instruments and Exchange Act to give crypto assets a legal status as financial products, the Nikkei business daily said on Sunday.】

item.title: 印度法院驳回 JSW 钢铁公司和 Trafigura 关于批准某些焦炭进口的请求
item.description: 一份法院命令显示，印度一家法院拒绝了 JSW 钢铁公司和 Trafigura 提出的允许某些炼钢原料装运的请求，这是在新德里出台限制进口的新政策后该行业遭受的最新挫折。【原文：An Indian court has declined requests from JSW Steel and Trafigura to allow certain shipments of a steelmaking raw material, a court order showed, the latest setback after New Delhi's new policy curbing imports rattled the sector.】

item.title: 特朗普告诉美国全国广播公司（NBC），他 "不在乎 "汽车制造商是否因关税而涨价
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周六表示，他没有警告汽车业高管在对外国制造的汽车征收关税生效时不要提价，并告诉美国全国广播公司新闻（NBC News）他 "不在乎 "汽车业高管是否提价。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday he did not warn car industry executives against raising prices as tariffs on foreign-made autos come into force, telling NBC News he "couldn't care less" if they do.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国将撤销对委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）外国合作伙伴的授权
item.description: 接近美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府决定的消息人士周六表示，美国政府已通知委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）的外国合作伙伴，即将取消允许他们出口委内瑞拉石油和副产品的授权。【原文：The U.S. government has notified foreign partners of Venezuela's state oil company PDVSA of the imminent cancellation of authorizations that allow them to export Venezuelan oil and byproducts, sources close to the decision by President Donald Trump's administration said on Saturday.】

item.title: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 将斥资 1 亿美元在越南建造两家工厂
item.description: 巴西肉类包装商 JBS 周六宣布，将投资 1 亿美元在越南建设两家工厂，旨在扩大其在东南亚的业务，巩固其在全球市场的地位。【原文：Brazilian meatpacker JBS announced on Saturday that it will invest US$100 million to build two factories in Vietnam, aiming to expand its presence in Southeast Asia and strengthen its position in the global market.】

item.title: 消息人士称，ING 在欧洲扩张计划中与意大利 Popolare di Sondrio 公司会面
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，ING集团最近几周会见了意大利的Banca Popolare di Sondrio公司，该公司正寻求通过收购在欧洲发展。【原文：ING Groep met with Italy's Banca Popolare di Sondrio in recent weeks as it seeks to grow in Europe through takeovers, a person with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Poste 同意收购维旺迪持有的大部分意大利电信股份的广泛条款
item.description: 三位与此事关系密切的消息人士周六透露，意大利邮政已与维旺迪达成广泛协议，将收购该法国集团在意大利电信的大部分股份，并成为其主要投资者。【原文：Poste Italiane has agreed broad terms with Vivendi to buy the bulk of the French group's stake in Telecom Italia and become its main investor, three sources close to the matter said on Saturday.】
